sprite

Class Anm

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprite.Img
      • sprite.Anm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animation

    public abstract class Anm
extends Img
    Implements many methods that only make sense for an animation.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Brian Nakayama

    • Method Detail

      • setSlide

        public abstract void setSlide(int i)
        Sets the internal index of the image. Only supported in animations.

      • getSlide

        public abstract Img getSlide(int i)
        Get the slide at index i
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the slide.
        Returns:
        A new image containing the slide.

      • getClone

        public abstract Anm getClone(int... i)
        Get a clone with the specific image slides of this one.
        Parameters:
        i - The indexes of the slides for the clone
        Returns:
        A new animation clone with only a subset of slides.

      • getClone

        public abstract Anm getClone()
        Return a copy object of this one.
        Returns:
        An animation clone.

      • animate

        public abstract void animate(boolean animate)
        Set whether or not to treat the image as an animation.
        Parameters:
        animate - True to animate

      • accept

        public <T extends ImgCommand> void accept(T iC)
        A version of the command pattern. Since animations contain extra code, allow for an accept method to take an animation.
        Overrides:
        accept in class Img
        Parameters:
        iC -
